parsed.recap:
DEV: Lisle village obliterated when Rance's latent Mage-Gift violently awakened during bandit attack; villagers carried off; Senta found and Chose him; evidence discovered—bandits wore hidden red robes (Karsite), fled toward Menmellith; theorized captives for blood magic ritual; Rance collapsed from Gift-shock; Senta transported him unconscious four days to Haven; arrived Healers' Collegium; reported to Queen's Circle via full mind-merge with Talia; Mage-Gift confirmed; Karsite involvement (blood magic/Sun-Priests) confirmed; quartered at Healer's cottage for safety; diplomatic inquiries to neighboring nations ordered.

PEND: Rance's memories still blocked; Mage-Gift training without living teachers; Karse's blood magic purpose; fate of captured villagers; Talia's recovery and role adjustment; political management of unprecedented dual-knowledge situation.

entities.c: Rance reported Lisle destruction and Karsite blood magic involvement to Queen's Circle via full mind-merge with Talia
